alert.note: Alert for Huron; Sanilac; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:52AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuscola, Sanilac and Huron Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 251 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Austin to Cass City to near Birch Run. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cass City, Kinde and Gagetown around 255 AM EDT. Port Hope and Argyle around 305 AM EDT. Vassar, Millington and Ubly around 310 AM EDT. Mayville and Deckerville around 320 AM EDT. Forestville around 325 AM EDT. Kingston and Clifford around 330 AM EDT. Marlette around 340 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Parisville, Colling, Huron City, White Rock, Wisner, Ivanhoe, Rapson, Grindstone City, Ellington and Juhl. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
